title: Android Auto 7.6 update is now rolling out widely
content:
Google is rolling out a fresh update to Android Auto, bumping the app update to version 7.6 for all Android users.

moreâ€¦

The post Android Auto 7.6 update is now rolling out widely appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: While there's no official changelog for what's new, an updated version of Android Auto is now rolling out to all users in the form of 7.6.
